comments.comment:
I think this could be related to Kabir's fix in WFLY-2131.

CLI GUI makes this call at startup. It doesn't cause any serious problems in CLI GUI, but the NPE on the server looks ugly.
The call should fail, but with a proper OperationFailedException that propagates correctly to the client. It did before some changes I made for WFLY-2527 and should again fail now with the linked PR.
